subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Hurricanes seized a 3-0 lead in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference semifinal series. Only two teams in N.H.L. history have rallied from a 3-0 series deficit to win a series.
snippet: The Hurricanes seized a 3-0 lead in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference semifinal series. Only two teams in N.H.L. history have rallied from a 3-0 series deficit to win a series.
